AT.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
AT.description: Der japanische Kult-Arcade Titel ist in verschiedene Kapitel unterteilt. Er erzählt die mysteriöse Geschichte von Isa Jo und Kachi, die zwischen Innerem und Äußerem Weltraum gemeinsam einen erbitterten Kampf für die Menschheit bestreiten. Die zwei Hauptfiguren können über dem Boden schweben und akrobatische Schnellschuss-Manöver vollziehen: Sie fliegen auf Jet Packs und Hover Boards, während sie sich mit Gewehren, Schwertern und Bomben gegen Feindeshorden wehren. In den actionreichen Levels werden dem Spieler Feinde – darunter gigantische Boss-Gegner – in bestimmter Reihenfolge entgegen geschleudert. Um die höchstmögliche Punktzahl zu erzielen, muss der Spieler einen Level und dessen Gegnerwellen bis ins kleinste Detail studieren. Das Punktesystem in Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies motiviert die Spieler zu Höchstleistungen: Sie werden belohnt, wenn sie Feinde hintereinander ausschalten und dabei selbst möglichst wenig Schaden nehmen. Noch mehr Punkte bekommen sie für außergewöhnliche Manöver, wie etwa eine große Anzahl an Feinden reihenweise zu erledigen. Mit seinen versteckten Gameplay-Elementen bietet der Titel seinen Fans jede Menge Gesprächsstoff zu der besten Abwehrstrategie oder Technik, um an die begehrten Medaillen zukommen. Klassische Arcade-Action gespickt mit einigen Überraschungen – dieses Spiel ist mit seinen motivierenden Herausforderungen ein echtes Muss und lädt die Wii-Fans ein, sich mit dem Rest der Welt zu messen. Dieses Spiel unterstützt auch Japanisch.

AU.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
AU.description: The cult Japanese game, played in chapters, follows the mysterious story of Isa Jo and Kachi as they fight a battle for humanity between Inner and Outer Space. The two characters can fly above the ground and unleash fearsome firepower as they dash and glide using jet packs and flying boards, battling to repel the hordes of enemies with guns, swords and powerful bombs. To add to the challenge, each action-packed level has been designed to throw enemies, including gigantic bosses called Commanders, against you in a certain order. You will need to study a stage and its waves of enemies in great detail in order to achieve the best score possible. The scoring system in Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies offers an intense challenge for everyone. Players are rewarded for hitting successive enemies while suffering as little damage as possible and can reap more points if they perform extraordinary actions, such as hitting a large number of enemies in a row. The game gives fans plenty to talk about with lots of hidden gameplay elements to discover; such as the strategy to best tackle patterns of enemies or techniques that reward skilled players with coveted medals. This game also supports Japanese

BG.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies

The game gives fans plenty to talk about with lots of hidden gameplay elements to discover; such as the strategy to best tackle patterns of enemies or techniques that reward skilled players with coveted medals. This game also supports Japanese

BE.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
BE.description: Signé des studios japonais Treasure, le shooter sur rails culte se joue chapitre après chapitre et suit la mystérieuse histoire d'Isa Jo et de Kachi engagés dans une bataille pour la survie de l'humanité entre ciel et espace. Les deux personnages évoluent en volant à l'aide de jet packs et de skateboards aériens et sont capables d'une puissance de feu impressionnante pour repousser les hordes ennemies à grands renforts de guns, d'épées et de bombes destructrices. Pour pimenter le tout, chaque niveau rempli d'action a été conçu pour que vous fassiez face à un feu continu d'ennemis, dont des boss immenses, apparaissant dans un certain ordre. A vous d'étudier soigneusement chaque niveau et son flot d'ennemis pour obtenir le plus grand score possible. Le système de points de Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies offre un défi intense pour tout le monde. Plus vous touchez d'ennemis à la suite tout en vous faisant toucher le moins possible, plus vous obtenez de points. Des points supplémentaires sont également cumulables si vous réalisez des exploits tels que réussir à toucher un grand nombre d'ennemis à la suite. Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies promet de faire parler de lui parmi les fans car de nombreux éléments de gameplay restent à découvrir, à l'image des différentes stratégies pour toucher le plus efficacement possible une série déterminée d'ennemis ou encore les techniques pour obtenir les médailles tant convoitées. Vous pouvez également jouer à ce jeu en japonais.

ES.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
ES.description: El juego de culto japonés, que se juega en capítulos, continúa la misteriosa historia de Isa y Kachi y su lucha por la humanidad entre el Espacio interior y el Espacio exterior. Ambos personajes pueden elevarse por los aires y liberar un destructivo poder a la vez que se desplazan y planean con rapidez usando las mochilas y tablas voladoras, todo para rechazar a las hordas de enemigos armados con pistolas, espadas y bombas. Para aumentar el desafío, cada nivel, repleto de acción, está concebido para que los enemigos, entre ellos los gigantescos JEFES, aparezcan en un determinado orden. Tendrás que estudiar cada nivel y sus hordas de enemigos en detalle para poder conseguir la mejor puntuación posible. El sistema de puntuación de Sin and Punishment: Sucessor of the Skies ofrece un desafío intenso para todos. Los jugadores son recompensados cuando aciertan sucesivamente con sus disparos a los enemigos y a la vez consiguen sufrir el menor daño posible. También reciben un número mayor de puntos si efectúan acciones extraordinarias como acertar a un gran número de enemigos consecutivamente. El juego proporciona a los fans mucho de lo que hablar gracias a los elementos de juego que han de ser descubiertos, tales como la mejor estrategia para lidiar con un determinado esquema de enemigos o las técnicas que premian a los jugadores más habilidosos con las codiciadas medallas. Este juego también está disponible en japonés.

IT.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
IT.description: Il gioco cult giapponese, suddiviso in capitoli, porta avanti la misteriosa storia di Isa Jo e Kachi, nella loro battaglia spaziale per salvare l'umanità. I due personaggi possono sollevarsi da terra e scatenare un'incredibile potenza di fuoco, schivare i colpi e planare in aria grazie a zaini jet e tavole volanti, tutto per respingere ondate di nemici con fucili, spade e potenti bombe. Per rendere la sfida più difficile, ogni livello è stato programmato per porti di fronte a determinati nemici, inclusi giganteschi boss chiamati Commander, in un determinato ordine. Dovrai dunque studiare nel dettaglio ogni livello e le orde di nemici che ti attendono, se vorrai ottenere il punteggio più alto. Il sistema di calcolo del punteggio di Sin & Punishment: Successor of the Skies offre una vera sfida a tutti. I giocatori saranno premiati se riescono a colpire nemici in successione, subendo il minimo danno possibile; potranno ottenere punti extra eseguendo azioni speciali, ad esempio colpendo in sequenza un numero straordinariamente alto di nemici. Il titolo offre tanti elementi di gioco nascosti, dando ai giocatori diversi spunti su cui discutere, come le strategie per superare al meglio le schiere di nemici, o le tecniche di combattimento che premieranno i migliori giocatori con ambite medaglie. Il gioco è disponibile anche in giapponese.

The scoring system in Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies offers an intense challenge for everyone. Players are rewarded for hitting successive enemies while suffering as little damage as possible and can reap more points if they perform extraordinary actions, such as hitting a large number of enemies in a row. The game gives fans plenty to talk about with lots of hidden gameplay elements to discover; such as the strategy to best tackle patterns of enemies or techniques that reward skilled players with coveted medals. This game also supports Japanese

NL.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
NL.description: Deze speelhalachtige Japanse cultgame is verdeeld in hoofdstukken die het mysterieuze verhaal vertellen van Isa Jo en Kachi, twee dappere personages die in buitenaardse omgevingen voor de mensheid strijden. Beide personages kunnen loskomen van de grond met jetpacks en hoverboards om zich met duizelingwekkende manoeuvres door de lucht te verplaatsen. Ondertussen bestrijden ze de hordes vijanden met geweren, zwaarden en krachtige bommen. Elk level staat bol van de explosieve actie, en stuurt tal van vijanden, waaronder de reusachtige eindbazen die Commanders worden genoemd, in een bepaalde volgorde richting de speler. Om de best mogelijke scores te halen, is het de kunst om deze volgorde te bestuderen, zodat je precies weet waar de volgende golf vijanden op zal duiken. Het scoresysteem in Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies daagt spelers uit elk level en de golven vijanden nauwkeurig te bestuderen om de best mogelijke scores te kunnen halen. Spelers worden beloond door opeenvolgende vijanden te raken en zelf zo weinig mogelijk schade op te lopen. Buitengewone acties, zoals het uitschakelen van een groot aantal vijanden achter elkaar, leveren extra punten op. Dit spel geeft de liefhebbers veel gespreksstof, want er zijn talloze geheime spelelementen te ontdekken, zoals de beste manieren om bepaalde vijanden uit te schakelen of technieken voor gevorderden die worden beloond met speciale medailles. Deze game ondersteunt ook Japans.

NZ.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
NZ.description: The cult Japanese game, played in chapters, follows the mysterious story of Isa Jo and Kachi as they fight a battle for humanity between Inner and Outer Space. The two characters can fly above the ground and unleash fearsome firepower as they dash and glide using jet packs and flying boards, battling to repel the hordes of enemies with guns, swords and powerful bombs. To add to the challenge, each action-packed level has been designed to throw enemies, including gigantic bosses called Commanders, against you in a certain order. You will need to study a stage and its waves of enemies in great detail in order to achieve the best score possible. The scoring system in Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies offers an intense challenge for everyone. The game gives fans plenty to talk about with lots of hidden gameplay elements to discover; such as the strategy to best tackle patterns of enemies or techniques that reward skilled players with coveted medals. This game also supports Japanese

PL.description: The cult Japanese game, played in chapters, follows the mysterious story of Isa Jo and Kachi as they fight a battle for humanity between Inner and Outer Space. This game also supports Japanese

PT.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
PT.description: O jogo de culto japonês, jogado em capítulos, continua a misteriosa história de Isa Jo e de Kachi e da sua luta pela humanidade entre o Inner e o Outer Space. As duas personagens podem voar e usar o seu destrutivo poder militar ao mesmo tempo que se movem rapidamente e planam usando jetpacks e pranchas voadoras, lutando para repelir multidões de inimigos com armas, espadas e poderosas bombas. A acrescentar ao desafio estão níveis recheados de acção concebidos para te colocar contra inimigos, incluindo bosses gigantescos denominados Commanders, numa determinada ordem. Precisarás de estudar a fundo um nível e as suas ondas de inimigos se quiseres atingir a melhor pontuação possível. O sistema de pontuação em Sin and Punishment: Successor of the Skies oferece um intenso desafio para todos. Os jogadores serão recompensados se atingirem inimigos sucessivos sofrendo o mínimo de danos possível e poderão receber mais pontos se efectuarem acções extraordinárias como atingir um grande número de inimigos consecutivamente. O jogo dá aos fãs muito sobre o qual falar, com inúmeros elementos de jogabilidade escondidos a descobrir como a estratégia para melhor lidar com padrões de inimigos ou como técnicas que recompensam os jogadores mais dotados com as cobiçadas medalhas. Este jogo também está disponível em japonês.

RU.name: Sin and Punishment™: Successor of the Skies
RU.description: Необычайная концентрация и внимание потребуется игрокам в этом напряженном шутере. Ису и Качи преследуют. Они спасаются бегством и по пути расстреливают все, что попадается им на пути. Sin & Punishment: Successor of the Skies — долгожданное продолжение популярного японского шутера для консоли Nintendo 64, в котором вас ждут невероятные аркадные приключения в постапокалиптическом мире. Многочисленные уровни представляют собой прекрасные городские пейзажи и захватывающие дух подводные тоннели, населенные свирепыми врагами. Уничтожайте врагов и постарайтесь заработать как можно больше очков. Вам захочется проходить каждый уровень снова и снова, чтобы устанавливать новые рекорды. Ведь чем больше очков вы наберете, тем больше бонусов получите. В игре вас ждет множество скрытых элементов геймплея. Вам предстоит отыскать лучшую стратегию для атак и находить закономерности, которые позволят опытным игрокам получать различные награды. Эта игра также поддерживает японский язык.
